entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:31 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -38.9°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 12:29 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 35.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 35. Wind chill minus 55 in the morning and minus 46 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 12:29 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 48 in the evening and minus 53 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 12:29 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
